modName: Uruk hai Soldiers and Berserkers and a Commander and Uruk hai HQ from LOTR WIP
summary:
Uruk-hai soldiers, Berserkers, a Commander and a Uruk-hai HQ!
[IN PROGRESS!]
[size=7]We [color=#ff0000]NEED[/color] some[color=#ffff00] modders[/color] to [b][color=#00ff00]ASSIST[/color][/b][/size][size=7] with this mod![/size]
[size=6]Could this be [color=#00ff00][size=7]you[/size][/color]?[/size]
[size=5]Inbox \'[color=#ff0000]XFIGHTER342[/
descriptionHtml:
Uruk-hai soldiers, Berserkers, a Commander and a Uruk-hai HQ!
All Uruk-hai are possible followers, all you have to do is give them some mead!
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
The armour is from a separate mod made by: Mandarinn
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[List of mods from Mandarinn:]
Shields: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3454
Swords: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3247
Armour: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28793
Helmets: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5169
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
VERY BIG THANKS TO MANDARINN FOR HIS PERMISSION TO UPLOAD!
( The mods above^, are NOT required! (As they\'re included) Thank you! )
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
PLEASE feel free to upload your own images, if they\'re good; I\'ll upload them as Admin and give you full credit! (For the image.)
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Sorry guys, it\'s Dawnguard DLC required, and at the moment isn\'t properly finished/released... The place is the Hall of the Dead in Whiterun but you\'re going to have to type: \"Help uruk\" in the console then type: \"player.placeatme #######\" (Where \'#\' is add the corresponding code) to get the Uruk-hai soldiers, Berserkers and Commanders\'.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[IN PROGRESS!]
[size=7]We [color=#ff0000]NEED[/color] some[color=#ffff00] modders[/color] to [b][color=#00ff00]ASSIST[/color][/b][/size][size=7] with this mod![/size]
[size=6]Could this be [color=#00ff00]you?[/color][/size]
[size=5]Inbox \'[color=#ff0000]XFIGHTER342[/color]\'[/size], or comment to apply!
author: Tobias Luke Hana
